name: Adaptory
description:
Adaptory is an upcoming base-building survival game, combining multiple complex simulations with a story-rich world.

  • Play with a deep physics simulation that includes gravity, temperature, density, viscosity, phase transitions, and more than 40 different materials
  • Give instructions to your pawns to build up a thriving base, using the materials around you
  • Dig deep to discover a rich collection of materials and resources
  • Windows + Mac OS

This is a short (free!) Alpha 1 showing off some of the basic characters and gameplay systems, and I'd love to hear your feedback!

This game will be released on Steam with Early Access in 2023 once more of the systems and design has been completed.
